<nowiki>[[http://bigbluebutton.org/|BigBlueButton]]</nowiki> is an open source web conferencing system for distance education.  It <nowiki>[[http://bigbluebutton.org/components|incorporates]]</nowiki> components from over fifteen other open source projects, such as Nginx webserver, Tomcat Java server, Red5 flash server, Asterisk/FreeSWITCH PBX, grails, pdftools, and others.  The current version of BigBlueButton is built and packaged for Ubuntu Lucid 10.04.

=== Installation ===

* See the <nowiki>[[http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/wiki/InstallationUbuntu|installation instructions]]</nowiki> installation on Ubuntu 10.04 32-bit or 64-bit.

=== Integration with other open source projects ===

** Integrations exist for Moodle, Joomla, Drupal, WordPress, Tiki, and other open source projects.  For more information see <nowiki>[[http://bigbluebutton.org/support|open source integrations]]</nowiki>.
